name: Georgina Masó
desc: La Georgina porta 52 anys vivint aquí. En aquest pis han crescut els seus fills i fins i tot han arribat a estar-hi els seus nets. Ara no li han doar altre opció que vendre-ho tot per una miseria.
descENG: Georgina has lived here for 52 years. Her children have grown up in this apartment and her grandchildren have even come to live there. Now they have given her no other option but to sell everything for next to nothing.
